title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest social events based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engaged in my community.

title: Family Communication Support
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily communicate with my family through voice calls and video chats so that I can stay connected and engaged with them.

title: Social Engagement Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want to set reminders for upcoming social events or activities so that I do not miss opportunities for engagement.

title: Community Connection Features
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to help me find and connect with local community resources so that I can stay socially engaged and informed about activities that interest me.

title: User Feedback Mechanism
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily provide feedback on social features so that I can suggest improvements and feel heard.
